snippet: A judge in a criminal court in Antwerp, Belgium, ruled that Sharia4Belgium was a terrorist organization.
abstract: Belgian judge rules that Sharia4Belgium, group accused of recruiting fighters for Syria, is terrorist organization and sentences group leader Fouad Belkacem to 12-year prison term; ruling reflects European struggle to determine how best to combat home-grown extremism.
lead_paragraph: A judge in a criminal court in Antwerp, Belgium, ruled that Sharia4Belgium was a terrorist organization.

headline.main: Head of Belgian Group Said to Recruit Fighters for Syria Gets 12-Year Term
headline.print_headline: Belgian Court Jails Members of Group Linked to Terrorism
